Adapted original chapter

You sigh exasperated as you return home from school and allow the front door to close behind you. High school always drains the life out of you, especially when no girl likes you yet. Mercifully it being Friday means you get a much desired weekend's rest.

"Mom? Dad?" you call into the house, the lack of answer informing you that you have the house to yourself. Maybe later you can go to your favorite foot fetish websites, but for now you're just too tired. As you flump onto the couch however you notice something out of place... an old lamp rests in the corner of the living room.

"That's never been there..." you murmur as you approach the artifact. Picking it up, you see dust on it so you begin to rub it off. Suddenly... POOF!! A multi-color cloud appears and a figure begins to form. You are shocked, amazed, and turned on as the figure shapes into a beautiful genie!!

How old is she?

"A genie? Is it a genie?"

At this point, you have no idea what to think. The only possible answer is a genie, even though the girl standing in front of you looked only 13 years of age. As you gathered the facts, you had no other explanation, meaning, no normal person conviniently appears in the midst of rainbow-colored smog that was ironically formed by a lamp you had never seen before and was somewhat out of touch with the scenery in your living room. But being possibly the most skeptical person, you had to ask her.

"Are...Are you a g-"

"Yes, yes I am." The girl cut in, as she said smiling the most beautiful smile you saw in your life.

Now as you cope with that fact, you gaze upon her perfect body. She was a blond, but not just any kind of blond. Her hair illuminated an aura that just attracted you to it, and that only complimented her deep blue eyes with a purple eyeshadow that belonged to her face that was suited for an angel.

She had white skin, but it was if it was glowing, and you aren't even sure it's because she's a genie or simply from her own beauty. She's wearing a sky blue bell shirt that outlined her chest, and matching pants that reached to her beautiful bare ankels.

And there, at that moment, did you gaze at the cutest pair of feet you had ever dreamed of...

"It looks like it's your lucky day."

The part-developed genie seems to notice at the same time as you both glance briefly down at her conservative one-piece, sharing the same tint of pale blue that her now-lost clothing once had.

It's only after that you realise that for the first time, you can see her fantastic soles. As you take a moment to observe them once more, she speaks up "What is your second wish?"

"Wait a minute," you reply, taking a moment to sit down, "I've just wished you into some stocks while wearing a swimsuit and you ask for another wish without thinking twice about it?"

134222112111211221122121211111122.content:
Peering down at the now helpless girl feels you with a emotion you never would have thought you could have at the moment... Pity. Despite how she treated you earlier, you feel somewhat bad about what you are doing. Although a bit more extreme than you prefer, you can't exactly say you hated how Anguish treated you. Of course, you can't vouch for Ana, but it was actually somewhat... enjoyable. You could have dealt with a break, yeah, but in a way that made it somewhat better. Unlike you, however, she does not seem to enjoy this at all. Anguish is a pure dom, or "Domme," whatever. Anguish will fight until her last breath before submitting to anyone, while you were a bit more flexible. You never wanted to hurt the girl, just get some payback. But now, it would seem you need to completely break her will to get that payback. And despite everything she put you through, you doubt you'll have mental scars from this. Poor Anguish, though, might never recover. Again, you wonder why you even care about her well being. You're either too nice a guy, or she was right and you are developing feelings for her...

"Alright, it's time for a break. Leave the restraints for now, but remove the gag." You tell Ana.

"W-What? But... Master!" Ana pleads, her eyes going wide.

"Don't worry, I just want to talk with her."

Ana looks worried again, but obeys and the gag disappears from the Austrian girl's mouth. Anguish pants for a moment, making sure to get all the air she can before she could be possibly gagged again. Surprisingly, Anguish does not start mouthing off the second her mouth is free. There's a deafening silence where the three of you don't make a sound.

"Well?" Comes the sound of Anguish's voice.

"Well?" You ask back.

"Why did you stop? Do you expect me to... beg for mercy now?" Anguish's voice sounds almost like she had to force the words out.

"Nah, I'm giving you mercy. Free of charge. Unlike you, I think you're entitled to a break.

You hear Anguish scoff and chuckle. "A break? Heh, listen to yourself. You could torture me in endless ways, and you give me a break?!"

You shrug. "Yeah. What, you don't want one? Besides, my previous experience with you would have been more enjoyable with a break or two."

Anguish is silent again, before giggling. The giggle becomes a chuckle, and soon that becomes insane laughter. Anguish's body rocks back and forth as does her foot as she laughs. "BAHAHAHA! ENJOYABLE?! YOU ARE A WORM AFTER ALL!"

Ana looks visibly upset by the current events. "Master... are you going to let her talk to you like that?"

"Of course he is! He's a disgusting worm! He even admitted it! I thought back when you didn't answer me, you were just in shock. But now I see! You don't hate me at all! I bet you even..." Anguish tears up as she tries to hold back her giggles. "LOVE ME!" She can't hold back anymore and howls in laughter.

You stay silent and let her say her piece. Freedom of speech was still something everyone should have, after all. After a minute of laughing, her guffaws slow to hiccuping giggles. For such a sadist, you have to admit she was quite cute.

"Haaah... You even let me verbally abuse you without repercussions!" Her calm, confident tone was back again, so she must feel like she has some power despite being tied up and imprisoned. "You are a worm." She states with a smirk, as if it was a fact.

"Are you finished?" You finally speak up.

"Did I say you could talk, worm?!" Anguish tries her luck.

"Nope, sure didn't. I didn't ask, though." You smugly reply back.

"Rrgh! I should crush you beneath my toes like a real worm!" Anguish emphases by clenching her toes for both you and Ana to see. Speaking of Ana, she has been silent this entire time. "Now release me! So I can put you and the bitch in your places! I'll make sure you don't escape this time!"

"Actually, I was thinking of doing just that." You tell her.

"You... were?" Anguish asks, legitimate confusion in her voice.

"YOU WERE?!" Ana shouts out, looking at you with wide eyes.

You put your hand up to reassure the genie, and give her a smile. Ana seems to calm down slightly but still looks tense. The Austrian princess is on the edge waiting for your response.

"Yes. See, Anguish, if that's even your real name, I'm not a sadist like you. I don't enjoy watching you suffer. This was more anger than anything. And did you really think I would keep you in there forever?"

Ana grows more worried with every word, but Anguish breathes a sigh of relief, her feet relaxing.

"It's not for everyone, is it, worm? It takes a truly gifted individual to control the hearts of others. And you very much appreciate that gift, no?"

"I can't speak for Ana, but you know your stuff I gotta admit."

Anguish beams from the ego boost. "Of course! Now, your Mistress demands to be freed at once!"

"Whoa there, you're no one's mistress right now. I said I would release you, but only on one condition."

The princess is silent for a moment. "And that would that be?"

"You relinquish control of Ana."

"WHAT?!" Comes the voice inside the cube.

"You heard me. It's the only way I will free you."

"Why on Earth would I give up Ana?! She gives me more power than I ever had!"

"Power comes and goes, y'know? This is your only way out."

"Ha! You must think me an imbecile! Even if I were to give up Ana, what's stopping you from going back on your word?"

"Hm, you're right. Ana? I wish Anguish would be freed if she surrenders you."

"B-But, if she's freed..." Ana starts to panic.

"She'll no longer have control." You put a hand on her shoulder reassuringly.

Ana hesitates, before nodding. "As you wish..." With a snap of her fingers, yellow dust sprinkles on the cube. It glows a brief moment.

"There's your way out, Anguish. Use it if you want, or stay in there. I gave you your options."

Anguish looks horrified as she processes her only chance at freedom.
134222112111211221122121211111122.title: Rest for the Wicked

choices: "Alright, Ana. I wish she had her dress and sandals again."
"Nah, you have to earn them back."
1342221121112112211221212111111221.content:
A few moments have passed since you gave your ultimatum and the princess.still hasn't responded. Suddenly, a faint little whine can be heard from the cube.

"Please... don't make me give up Ana. She's all I have left!"

"What are you talking about?" You ask.

"I'm not even supposed to be alive! You brought me here, and now you will leave me stranded in an unknown land with nothing?!"

"This didn't seem to be a major concern of yours until now..."

"I didn't think of it until now, worm! I release Ana and then what? You torture me? Force me out into the streets to starve?!"

"Alright, you're being a little dramatic here. I'm not leaving you to die anywhere."

"So you say!"

"Look, I don't blame you for what happened. If anything, it was my fault for bringing you here. Ana tried to warn me you were... a little aggressive, but I thought I could handle that. Guess I couldn't, huh?"

Anguish lets out a short laugh, somewhat uncharacteristically. "No, you couldn't. Another hour and I would have completely broken you, worm."

"Heh, you just might have." you grin back. Ana furrows her brow, both at being left out of the conversation, and the weird way it seemed the two of you were flirting. "But as I said, I can't blame you for that. Can you blame a bear for attacking if you poke it with a stick? Maybe you could have asked for more a teeeeny bit more consent, though."

"Worms are not allowed consent." Anguish states, as if it were a rule in the Domme handbook. "I know what is best."

You can't help but laugh and shake your head at how... professional she sounds, as if they had "princessdom" classes in Austria.

"I also take full responsibility for bringing you here, so I wouldn't just toss you out like that. I see it like this: I brought you here for my own selfish reasons against your consent. You decided to punish me against my consent, but went a bit overboard. Now you're trapped and I say we're even."

"Even?! If I wish to be free, I must give you sole control of Ana! You will have more power than me, worm!"

With a shrug, you grin down into the cube. "Can't win 'em all, sorry."

Anguish growls softly as her two choices again appear before her. This is most likely the most powerless the princess has ever been in her life, so you give her some time to think. After a moment, she speaks up. "And you swear to take responsibility for my lodging?"

"Of course, princess." You smile.

"You are not worthy to address me a such, worm! Only the subjects of my glorious homeland may refer to me as 'princess!'"

You huff and roll your eyes at her. "Sure, whatever. Now do you want to get out of there? I could easily slip that gag back on...

"There's no need for that!" Anguish quickly replies. She's quiet again for a moment, weighing the outcomes of what she is about to do. Finally, you hear her draw a breath and speak. "...Fine... I surrender control of Ana!"

As your wish dictated, the box begins to glow a bright yellow and rise into the air. Ana cowers behind you, scared of what will happen next. The glow becomes so intense you have to turn your head away as the cube spit out the raven haired girl onto your floor, a groan of pain escaping her lips. The Austrian princess now lies on your floor, freed from both the cube and the tape. You didn't specify how free after all. Oops. As she struggles to her feet, you quickly scoop up the "Splicer" as she called it and give it to Ana for safe keeping. Ana nods and poofs away quickly, probably to get away from her former mistress. You walk over to help the girl up.

Extending your hand, you reach down. "Here, let me-"

"I don't need your help!" She swats your hand away.

"Fine..." You step back and leave her to it.

When she gets her balance, she closes her eyes to, what you assume, gain her composure. You look down and see she's still in the bikini Ana stuck her in. Your eyes find themselves back to her toes, painted black as midnight, the ones that got you into this mess in the first place. When she finally seems calmed down enough, she opens her mouth to speak, but cuts herself off when she looks down.

"M-My clothes! What happened to them?!" She screams, covering herself.

"You kinda took them off when you made that room..." You respond, bringing your eyes up to meet hers.

"Shut up! Find my clothes, now worm!"

"You literally poofed them out of existence!"

"Then get Ana-... your genie to bring them back!"

As if on cue, Ana appears in another puff of smoke. "Did I miss any-" She can't help but laugh out loud at her former mistress trembling and naked. "Bwahaha! Looking good there, Anguish!" Ana's eyes suddenly go wide. "I don't have to call you mistress anymore!" She jumps into the air and fist pumps, levitating afterwards.

Anguish grits her teeth and pretends to ignore her and turns to you. "Now bring my clothes back!"
1342221121112112211221212111111221.title: Freedom Ain't Free

choices: Bring her down to meet the folks.
Try to keep her a secret.
13422211211121122112212121111112211.content:
You cross your arms at her tone. "Y'know, the word 'please' exists for a reason."

Anguish narrows her eyes at you. "I thought you were not going to make me beg, being the merciful worm you are." She emphasizes her backhanded compliment with a smirk.

Letting out a sigh, you pinch the bridge of your nose between your eyes. "This could be so much easier than you're making it..."

"Why should I have to ask for my clothes?!" Anguish snaps back. "You put me in this... revealing thing, so now you are obligated to give me something more suitable!"

You scratch your head at her logic. "Might have a point there if you hadn't stripped the both of us naked and did much worse to our bodies than we did to yours. So if anything, you owe me some gratitude for being such a 'merciful worm.'" You mimic the grin she gave you.

Anguish, however, is not pleased. "You want me to THANK you?! Bah! That is almost as bad as begging! And furthermore, I need not be thankful for what I deserve. You released me--at the cost of Ana, yes--but you understood that as your Mistress, I deserved to be free." Her smirk has now upgraded to a toothy grin, and your nose pinch upgrades to a full facepalm.

"Look, just say 'thank you' and I will give you your clothes. That sounds fair, right?"

"Wrong! You will give me my clothes NOW!" She stomp her foot in anger. The two of you stare off for a few seconds before Ana steps in between.

"It's obvious she's not gonna give in. We might have to 'persuade' her some more."

"We just might..." You respond.

"No one gave you permission to speak, djinn!" The ex-mistress barks at her ex-servant.

"Sorry there, Anguish..." Ana sighs a bit as she relishes in her release from the cruel girl. "But my new master here is not as strict as you... hopefully not." Ana glances back at you and you raise your eyebrow in response. Anguish opens her mouth to retort. As she is about to, no doubt, call you some variation of worm, you cut her off.

"Enough! This is going nowhere fast, so I'll be the bigger person here and give you your clothes so we can get this over with and on with our lives!" The exasperation in your voice is obvious. Anguish, surprisingly, doesn't say anything and simply nods her head. Ana, however, lets our a frustrated groan.

"Aw c'mon. Don't you want to watch her squirm like she made us?" She pokes you in the ribs as she tries to persuade you.

You laugh and shake your head softly. "We did. She talks a big game, but Anguish is the 'dish it, but can't take it' type. Besides, we have clothes while she's stuck in a bikini. We're not perverts like her, are we, Ana?"

"Alright, Ana. I wish she had her dress and sandals again." With a nod, the genie grants your wish. A puff of smokes envelopes Anguish and she is once again wearing the clothes you first met her in when the smoke clears. Anguish seems pleased as she runs her hands down her dress to smooth out any wrinkles.

"How kind of you. You may be a worm, but a gentlemanly worm." The princess smiles warmly, as if what she said was a genuine compliment. In fact, it's difficult to tell if that actually was a compliment. She goes back to examining her outfit, looking down and wiggling her toes in her sandals.

"Now I've had just about enough of-" Your comeback is cut short when you catch something shiny out of your peripheral vision. Glancing down, you see the light has reflected off Anguish's midnight nails, creating an almost hypnotic glow. Anguish takes notice of your gaze and grins deviously.

"A worm still infatuated with feet, as well. More importantly, the very same pair that almost led to your complete destruction not even an hour ago. Still have not learned, have we?"

"Master!" Ana calls out to you, afraid you are about to fall under Anguish's spell once again.

"Aw, do not be shy. You are more than welcome to grovel at your Mistress's feet any time, worm." Somehow, the emphasis she puts on the word sends a jolt down your spine as Anguish takes a step forward. "Yes... kissing, licking, worshiping, adoring... Sounds heavenly, no?" Your eyes are now locked on hers as your body feels frozen on the spot and heart begins to pound in your chest. How is she doing this? Anguish now stands before you as she reaches up a hand to your face, caressing your cheek with her thumb.

"Master? MASTER?! What are you doing?! Snap out it!" Ana floats around you, trying desperately to get your attention. "Er... make a wish, push her away, anything!"

"Maybe I was going about this the wrong way..." Anguish chuckles darkly. Suddenly, something far more powerful than genie magic or a sadistic Austrian princess 'Domme' makes you nearly jump out of your skin...

"We're home!" Come the voices of your parents from downstairs.

"Mom?! Dad?!" You turn to face your door so fast you knock Anguish over on her butt. Panic sets in as you hadn't even thought of what to tell your parents when they got back from work. "Ana! Quick, back in the watch!" You tap at the face of the watch frantically. Ana rolls her eyes as she turns to mist to slip into her new home. You then whirl back around to see Anguish sitting on the floor, looking up at you understandably peeved.

Realizing that keeping Anguish a secret might bring more trouble than it's worth, you decide to bite the bullet and let your parents know about your new guest. At least she's human and will be less trouble explaining than a magical genie. Without thinking, you offer your hand to Anguish to help her up. This time, she actually accepts your offer. But stalling is just going to make the situation more suspicious. Cracking your door open slightly, you shout downstairs. "Hey, I've got something to show you!" This way, it won't be as big a shock hopefully.

"It better be a girlfriend!" Comes your father's reply.

"You better not be sneaking girls up there!" Was your mother's indirect reply.

Crap. Maybe this will be awkward. Shutting your door, you turn your head towards Anguish. She's simply standing there, calmly enjoying how flustered you look at the moment. "Alright... I'm gonna need you to tone it down a bit when you meet my parents."

"Are you telling your Mistress how to behave, worm?" She raises an eyebrow and crosses her arms.

"See? None of that 'mistress' stuff. I don't think they'd appreciate that kinda talk and might just toss you out. Their house, not mine."

Anguish purses her lips as if disappointed. "Very well." A sigh of relief escapes your own lips. Anguish is actually being reasonable for once. You open your door and offer her to walk through first. She stops right before the door frame and turns her head to face you. "And I did not even have to ask, worm." Her lips curl into a smug grin. Should have known she would mistake your act of kindness for an act of submission... But now's not the time to worry as you follow her down the staircase. Once at the bottom, you direct Anguish in the direction of the living room. She reaches for her fan and extends it over her face. Guess she got that back too. As soon as she walks to where your parents are seated, their eyes quickly glue to her, darting from her eyes to yours.

"Um, hello... miss." Your mother says, rightfully confused. You father is too shocked to even say anything. Anguish respectfully curtsies.

"Zdravo. Kako ste kaj?" She asks with a warm smile. You knew what she said was a simple 'Hello, how do you do?', but your parents were not effected by your wish to understand her and are now even more confused.

"Do you speak English?" Your father finally speaks up. Now it's Anguish's turn to be confused.

"Bi lahko ponovite, prosim?" 'Could you repeat that?'. Hearing this conversation was quite odd. You knew what both sides were saying, but not them. A brilliant idea suddenly came to you to explain why she was here.

"Mom, Dad, this is... Ana. A foreign exchange student from Austria. She'll be staying with us for a little while. I'm, uh, sorry I never got around to telling you."

"Yeah, knowing someone was going to be living here and eating our food is a little important." Dad raises an eyebrow an crosses his arms.

"What did you tell them?" Anguish asks you.

"You're a student from Austria." You answer.

"I didn't know you spoke another language!" Mom remarks, smiling. Oh, so that's how the wish worked. When you talk to Anguish she hears her language and you hear yours, but this is only between the two of you.

"Heh, well, I do! ...That's why they picked me to act as her host. I'm the only one who could translate for her. She just got here from the airport and I was showing her around the house when you got home."

"Still doesn't mean a stranger isn't going to be eating all our food..." Dad is still grumpy about the whole thing.

"Don't worry, she has her own money. It's just staying at a hotel would be too costly and she needed someone who spoke her language." Upon hearing 'own money' Dad's mood instantly softens.

"Well, guess that's okay. Welcome to our home, Ana." Dad manages to crack a smile for once.

"Yes, it's very nice to meet you, Ana!" Mom smiles happily at her.

Your parents stare at the girl, seemingly waiting for a response. Anguish keeps her smile, but turns to you for help. "They said it was nice to meet you." You whisper in her ear.

"Oh! Me veseli, kot dobro." 'Nice to meet you too' she answers with a polite nod.

"I was just about to show Ana her room. The guest room okay?" You ask your folks.

"Sure, sure. Go get her settled in." Dad says. You tell Anguish the plan and she nods her head. Turning to your parents, she curtsies a final time.

"Dober večer." 'Good evening' she says as she begins following you up the stairs.

"What a nice, polite young lady." Your mother remarks.

"So we're not ruling out the girlfriend thing, right?" You father asks with a grin.

"Oh, hush." Mom playfully slaps him across the knee.

Meanwhile, back upstairs in the guestroom, Ana busts out of the watch when the three of you are alone. "You gave her my name?" She asks, somewhat offended. Anguish is milling about the room, examining the plain bed, plain walls, and empty closet.

"What, you expected me to give her that porn star sounding name? Besides, Ana is just the name she gave to you, right? Don't you want to get rid of it?"

Ana seems to actually ponder this a moment. "Maybe..."

"So this is to be my chambers?" The Austrian girl's voice says from the other side of the room. "This will not do at all." She turns to you.

"It's the guest room." You answer flatly.

"And I am more than a mere guest. I expect my host to accommodate me."

Reading the manual reveals some harsh truths:

1) By giving her a wish and by that wish being your last, you are now her genie until you grant her a total of three wishes. The rulebook states that wishes must be given out in a minimum of threes. There is no maximum.

2) The one granting the wish is allowed to interpret the wish as he or she fits. And since her delicious foot was in your crotch, she made the rules for that wish.

3) Once a genie, always a genie. If a genie is freed or wished away from their lamp, they can still use their genie powers, but they are not bound by the relationship of Genie-Master. They are still bound by the rules of a genie, lest they give up those rules and live life as a mortal from whatever age the former genie chooses.

In the end, the facts were these: You found her, she granted you two wishes. She then tricked you into giving her your third wish. Now, she has two wishes left and you have to do whatever she tells you to do until her wishes are used up. At that point, you'll be back to you having no more wishes and neither would she.

The biggest issue here was getting back your youth and getting her to stay around. Because you got greedy, your desires would have to wait until you sorted this out.

But now... you have a plan. You have knowledge that she may not even know. Five thousand plus years as a genie or not, she doesn't seem to be the one who knows the rulebook by heart.

First things first: Get back your youth.

info.brief_description: You find a mystical genie who will let you play with her young toes.
info.description:
A story about you, a typical high-school student, taking charge of a beautiful young genie girl and having fun.

Originally set up by howdyboy, this is revived with permission. Many of the early chapters are adapted from the original, and these are marked as such.

Promotional Offers!
The best addition/s each month will be rewarded with a "Genie" merit badge!
All good additions (anything more than a few lines that meets the rules below) will get rewarded 500 GP!
Discontinued until overall writing.com activity picks up.

Rules:

0: Never think "I can't write well enough"! All contributions are very welcome.

1: No male feet, only female (primarily the genie!).
2: Try to keep it about feet, a few sexual things here and there (except for the youngest genie) are OK.
3: Nothing too dark (e.g. rape, death) or disgusting (e.g. bestiality, scat).
4: Please avoid tiny chapters.
5: Please avoid long time jumps.
6: Have fun!

In a bid to improve the reading experience, I'll correct all spelling and grammar mistakes. I also reserve the ability to make minor alterations to chapters if it is necessary to insert detail or correct one of the above rules being broken.

Finally, this story is not related to the 1960's TV series created by Sidney Sheldon - its title is merely a reference.
